Articles.Content: So, it's great that we can filter our crafts in map view and control center based on type (probe, ship, station, rover etc.) but I think it would be great to add a second layer to that by selecting a filter for location (Kerbin, Minmus, Escape-paths etc.)
this has been suggested many times before. would be nice. that way I can name my crafts what I want with out giving them names like duna station

Would be nice. that way I can name my crafts what I want with out giving them names like duna station

Yeah, exactly that! Now I use abbreviations for everything...

I love this idea. I think the filtering system needs some work anyway. For example, maybe I want to filter out probes and rovers, but leave everything else. With the current system, you can only filter for 1 type of craft.
